channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet, Inc. -- FortiWeb
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet, Inc. -- FortiWeb

item.title: CVE-2017-14191|2024-09-16T19:00:31.333Z -- fortinet%2C%20inc. -- fortiweb
item.description: An Improper Access Control vulnerability in Fortinet FortiWeb 5.6.0 up to but not including 6.1.0 under "Signed Security Mode", allows attacker to bypass the signed user cookie protection by removing the FortiWeb own protection session cookie.
